title: Angular Developer
description: Master Angular and build scalable web applications.
steps: Understand Angular CLI and Module System
Work with Components, Directives, and Pipes
Unit and E2E Testing with Jasmine & Karma

title: Backend Developer
description: Learn backend development concepts including databases, APIs, authentication, and server management.
steps: Choose a backend programming language (Node.js, Python, Java, etc.)
Learn how servers and databases work
Explore GraphQL as an alternative to REST APIs
Master database management (SQL, NoSQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
Understand cloud deployment strategies (AWS, DigitalOcean, Heroku)
Explore backend testing (Unit, Integration, API testing)

title: C# Developer
steps: Work with ASP.NET Core for web applications
Use Entity Framework for database interactions

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Learn CI/CD, cloud computing, and infrastructure automation.
steps: Learn CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI)
Deploy and scale applications on cloud platforms

title: Frontend Developer
description: Learn the skills to become a frontend developer, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks.
steps: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics
Master advanced CSS concepts (Flexbox, Grid, Animations)
Learn Responsive Design and Media Queries
Master JavaScript ES6+ features and best practices
Explore JavaScript frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular)
Understand version control with Git & GitHub
Learn how to optimize frontend performance

title: Java Developer
description: Learn Java and backend development with Spring Boot.
steps: Work with Spring Boot for backend APIs
Build RESTful APIs with Spring MVC

title: Node.js Developer
description: Become proficient in Node.js and backend API development.
steps: Work with Express.js for REST APIs

title: React Developer
description: Master React and build modern frontend applications with component-based architecture.
steps: Learn React Functional and Class Components
State Management with Hooks (useState, useEffect, useReducer)
Manage global state (Redux, Zustand, Context API)
Optimize performance with React.memo and useCallback
Testing with Jest and React Testing Library

title: System Engineer
description: Understand system architecture, networking, and hardware management.
steps: Automate infrastructure with Ansible and Terraform

title: Vue Developer
description: Learn Vue.js and build interactive applications efficiently.
steps: Manage state with Vuex or Pinia
Optimize Vue performance (Lazy loading, Vue Suspense)
